author: Peter Drucker
message: Follow effective action with quiet reflection. From the quiet reflection will come even more effective action.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bernice Reagon
message: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you, they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
title: Thought of the day

author: Fannie Hamer
message: There is one thing you have got to learn about our movement. Three people are better than no people.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
message: Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
title: Thought of the day
